snippet.title: Monolith Run - Feb 11, 2017
snippet.description:
If you like what you see here, try the demo!
https://monolithdevs.itch.io/monolith

Way back in august, I recorded a video of me playing Monolith up to the current end - which was only floor 2. Well, we've gone quite a ways since then and the game is actually twice as long, so I figured it was probably about time to give a quick teaser of what we have going on.
